tool_description: Web News Data API contains news Titles and URL for each news. Easy to see news and it is very easy to search news of everywhere.
name: Web News Data
title: Web News Data

api_list.name: Get all web news here
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://web-news-data.p.rapidapi.com/web-news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web-news-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://web-news-data.p.rapidapi.com/web-news/{guardian}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web-news-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
